string.text: Forced Wars and custom AI centered around GOT lore
The kings of Westeros will declare war on anyone who declares war on the Night's Watch
The Night's Watch may not get involved in wars with anyone except the Free Folk
The Free Folk may not get involved in wars with anyone except the Night's Watch
Set the amount of days needed to wait for the destruction of a kingdom once the destruction conditions are met.
Relation Needed For Lord To Join Free
Set the relation needed for a lord to join your kingdom for free.
Relation Needed For Lord To Never Join
Set the relation needed for a lord to never want to join your kingdom.
Base Gold per Relation Point Away
Set the base gold for the formula that equates in how much gold is needed for a lord to join.
Set vassals needed to be gone as a condition for destruction. Mercenary clans are not included.
Toggle dueling other lords and ladies.
Maximum difference between your clan tier and the lord you wish to duel.
Enables sending ravens to other lords and ladies. You may wish to disable ravens if you have another mod with a similar feature like Telepathy or Diplomacy.
If enabled, adds a small chance of failure for Ravens. The longer the flight, the higher the chance of an accident.
If enabled, you can only send a raven to people you have met or at least likely to know of. Otherwise, you can send a raven to a person regardless your knowledge of addressee.
The maximum amount of time (in days) it could take the raven to reach the addressee. Directly affects the flight speed of the raven.
Gold cost for sending a raven to another character.
Your raven was hunted and killed by a {PREDATOR} while trying to reach {HERO NAME}!
The raven either does not understand or does not like your joke and refuses the task.
You know too little of {HERO_NAME} to point them out for a raven.
The raven won't be able to reach the addressee.
The raven from {FACTION1_NAME} has arrived at {ADDRESSEE_TEXT}.
The raven from {FACTION1_NAME} will arrive at {ADDRESSEE_TEXT} within {TRAVEL_TIME} days.
{HERO_NAME} is fugitive and doesn't want to be found.
{HERO_NAME} has just been released from custody and is not yet ready to receive ravens.
{HERO_NAME} is too inexperienced to get a message delivered by raven.
A raven has already been dispatched to {HERO_NAME}.
The Night's Watch honor all kings and obey none.
The Free Folk do not engage in formal war.
Your sovereign will not entertain peace.
Your war with the Night's Watch makes peace impossible.
Your equipment belongs to me now.
Your dragon will fight for me now.
YOU'LL PAY IN FIRE AND BLOOD!
Enable or disable this war; starts on day 25
Enable or disable this war; starts on day 50
Enable or disable this war; starts on day 60
Customizes AI to fit the GOT world
